name: OPPA Token
description: OPPA is a deflationary fan-based token that will not only bring you to the moon but will also fulfil your greatest OPPA dream, a chance to MEET your favourite OPPA stars! OPPA will give you a "rise-like-the-stars" earning potential by simply being an OPPA Token holder OPPA is the native utility token that is used for: Payment to participate in "Meet and Greet" events Payment for purhcase of goods from our multi-vendor marketplace, Payment for training sessions and materials from the OPPA Academy Participation to exclusive OPPA events and Loyalty programs OPPA tools include: Meet and Greet (coming soon) Multi-Vendor Marketplace for various merchandise OPPA academy (coming soon) NFT Marketplace (coming soon)
